snippet: Inhibited sexual desire (ISD) refers to a low level of sexual interest. A person with ISD will not start, or respond to their partner's desire for, sexual activity. ISD can be primary (in which the person has never felt much sexual desire or inter...
lead_paragraph: Inhibited sexual desire (ISD) refers to a low level of sexual interest. A person with ISD will not start, or respond to their partner's desire for, sexual activity. ISD can be primary (in which the person has never felt much sexual desire or interest), or secondary (in which the person used to feel sexual desire, but no longer does). ISD can also relate to the partner (the person with ISD is interested in other people, but not his or her partner), or it can be general ( the person with ISD isn't sexually interested in anyone). In the extreme form of sexual aversion, the person not only lacks sexual desire, but may find sex repulsive. Sometimes, the sexual desire is not inhibited. The two partners have different sexual interest levels, even though both of their interest levels are within the normal range. Someone can claim that his or her partner has ISD, when in fact they have overactive sexual desire and are very demanding sexually.

headline.main: Inhibited Sexual Desire

snippet: The wirephoto showed a couple of blurred male faces in the background -- Boris Yeltsin and Mikhail Gorbachev, in their funereal dark suits and ties -- while in the forefront, Sazhi Umalatova, 37, a deputy elected by the angry citizens of Chechen-I...
lead_paragraph: The wirephoto showed a couple of blurred male faces in the background -- Boris Yeltsin and Mikhail Gorbachev, in their funereal dark suits and ties -- while in the forefront, Sazhi Umalatova, 37, a deputy elected by the angry citizens of Chechen-Ingush, a bright knitted jacket on her broad shoulders, lashed into the man at the top. "You do not have the right to lead the country," she said. "You brought devastation, hunger, cold, blood, tears." The defiant woman from the Caucasus answered the Soviet leader's demand for dictatorial powers with her own call for a vote of no confidence. But only one-fourth of the 2,000 delegates in the Congress of People's Deputies -- mostly male apparatchiks -- voted with her; Mr. Gorbachev, ominously promising "discipline," prevailed.

headline.main: Bad Year for Women

snippet: Intersex is a group of conditions where there is a discrepancy between the external genitals and the internal genitals (the testes and ovaries). The older term for this condition, hermaphroditism, came from joining the names of a Greek god and god...
lead_paragraph: Intersex is a group of conditions where there is a discrepancy between the external genitals and the internal genitals (the testes and ovaries). The older term for this condition, hermaphroditism, came from joining the names of a Greek god and goddess, Hermes and Aphrodite. Hermes was a god of male sexuality (among other things) and Aphrodite a goddess of female sexuality, love, and beauty. Although the older terms are still included in this article for reference, they have been replaced by most experts (and patients and families) because they are misleading, confusing, and insensitive. Increasingly this group of conditions is being called disorders of sex development (DSDs).

headline.main: Intersex

snippet: For both men and women, pain can occur in the pelvic area during or soon after sexual intercourse. It can happen at any time during sex -- for example, at the time of penetration, erection, or ejaculation -- or after sexual activity. Eventually, o...
lead_paragraph: For both men and women, pain can occur in the pelvic area during or soon after sexual intercourse. It can happen at any time during sex -- for example, at the time of penetration, erection, or ejaculation -- or after sexual activity. Eventually, ongoing pain may cause a person to lose interest in any sexual activity. The medical term for this is dyspareunia.

snippet: We don’t need drugs based on mistaken ideas about how desire works....
lead_paragraph: We don’t need drugs based on mistaken ideas about how desire works.
abstract: Op-Ed article by sex educator Emily Nagoski holds drug flibanserin, intended to treat low sex drive in women, is based on flawed premise; notes FDA has rejected drug twice and will likely reject it third time due to safety and efficacy concerns; says what is needed in most cases of women who lack desire is better understanding of one's own sexuality and acceptance of differences; says in pathologizing normal behavior, drug causes more harm than good.

headline.main: Nothing Is Wrong With Your Sex Drive
headline.print_headline: Nothing Is Wrong With Your Sex Drive

snippet: West Point and the other service academies need new rules....
lead_paragraph: West Point and the other service academies need new rules.
abstract: Op-Ed article by law students Ashley Anderson, Air Force Academy graduate, and Elizabeth Deutsch notes military service academies West Point, Naval Academy and Air Force Academy are exempt from oversight that guards against sex crimes at civilian schools; holds this leaves some 2,700 female cadets and midshipmen without legal recourse; urges Pres Obama to enforce same Title IX rights offered to other college females as way to challenge sexual discrimination at academies.

headline.main: Stop Assaults on Military Campuses
headline.print_headline: Stop Assaults on Military Campuses

abstract: Ross Douthat Op-Ed column argues that Elliot Rodger's murderous spree in Isla Vista, Calif, reflects a wider cultural misogyny in which sexual fulfillment is treated as the source and summit of a well-lived life; notes that Rodger undertook murders after expressing a sense of shame and fury over sexual inexperience.

snippet: A high school teacher arrested last week on charges that he had sex with a student was arrested again on charges that he had sex with a second student. Frank Bencivengo, 34, a teacher and baseball coach at Morgan High School in Clinton, was arrest...
lead_paragraph: A high school teacher arrested last week on charges that he had sex with a student was arrested again on charges that he had sex with a second student. Frank Bencivengo, 34, a teacher and baseball coach at Morgan High School in Clinton, was arrested on Friday at his home in Madison on charges of second-degree sexual assault. The allegations in that case involve a female former student at the high school. His arrest on sexual assault charges on Tuesday pertained to a relationship he had with another Morgan High student. In that case, the police said, the student was above the age of consent, but under Connecticut law it is illegal for a teacher to have sex with a student.
abstract: Frank Bencivengo, teacher and coach at Morgan High School in Clinton, Conn, is arrested for having sex with underage female student; was recently arrested for having sex with female student of legal age (S)

headline.main: Metro Briefing | Connecticut: Clinton: Man Arrested On Second Sex Charge

abstract: Issue of sexual assaults on American Indian women has become one of the major sources of discord in the debate between the Obama administration and the House of Representatives over the reauthorization of the landmark Violence Against Women Act; the rate of sexual assault of American Indian women is more than twice the national average and reservation residents who report being attacked often confront gaps in medical and legal help.
